primevc.gui.traits.IDropTarget

type
interface
implements
primevc.gui.core.IUIContainer
Interface describing objects that can accapt objects to be dropped in.

Instance Variables

dragEvents(default,null) : primevc.gui.events.DropTargetEvents

Eventgroup which will dispatch events when an IDraggable object is interacting with this IDropTarget.

Instance Methods

getDepthForBounds(bounds : primevc.core.geom.IRectangle) : Int

Method which should return the depth of a dropped item with the given coordinates.

isDisplayDropAllowed(draggedItem : primevc.gui.display.DisplayDataCursor) : Bool

Method to check if an IDraggable-item is allowed to drop on this container.
